name: Best Ask.fm Transparency, No Ads, Updated
description:
Ask.fm with transparency, no ads and regularly updated.

Ask.fm con transparencia, sin publicidad y actualizado regularmente.
additional_info:
+ Fixed notification bar
+ Fixed Bar
+ Coloured buttons
+ Fixed frames
+ Show Stream button because of some bugs
+ Rounded profile pictures
+ Fixed like buttons
+ Fixed Non-visible labels
+ Full style (no bugs or glitches because it's updated every month)


I won't detail every update, unless i have to modify some important.

If you liked this style and you want me to update it more frequently please feel free to give feedback to improve the style or mantain it :) Thx you
